channel.title: How do i make spawning available for every1?
channel.description: Hey. Right now i am having a little bit of a problem. I made me server and i made me and me friend admins. There is only one problem though. i can use any command i want (::item, ::tele, ::barrows) but he cannot use any of the commands. when he types it in nothing happens. why? isnt he supposed to be able to since he is admin. and what if i want to make it so that all users can use all commands. how do i do that? thank you.

item.title: How do i make spawning available for every1?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You gotta compile your server after you change the 2 to a 0…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make spawning available for every1?
item.dc:creator: @x3mvess x3mvess
item.description:
@x3mvess wrote:

ok i’ll try it right now[br][size=1]Posted at: July 18, 2006, 03:01:29 PM[/size][hr]nope that doesnt work. :s what do i do. i am using nixscape btw. i tried putting a 0 instead of the 2 and i tried a lvl 3 normal user acc he still couldnt spawn. than i removed the whole text and the normal user still couldnt spawn. btw just a little note me commands dont go :
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“barrows”) && playerRights >= 2)
they are like this:
else if (command.startsWith(“barrows”)
just a tip. dunno how can i fix this. i want every1 to be able to spawn. even my new admin cant spawn. plz help.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make spawning available for every1?

item.title: How do i make spawning available for every1?
item.dc:creator: @cawagula cawagula
item.description:
@cawagula wrote:

Open your client.java

search for:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4720, 1); addItem(4722, 1); addItem(4708, 1); addItem(4710, 1); addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4753, 1); addItem(4755, 1); addItem(4757, 1); addItem(4759, 1); addItem(4745, 1); addItem(4747, 1); addItem(4749, 1); addItem(4751, 1); addItem(4732, 1); addItem(4734, 1); addItem(4736, 1); addItem(4738, 1); addItem(4726, 1); addItem(4728, 1); addItem(4730, 1); addItem(4724, 1); }

Change

&& playerRights >= 2

to

&& playerRights >= 0

Change all commands from 2 to 0 like above and anyone will be able to use.

Or I believe you can totally remove

&& playerRights >= 2

And it will be open to everyone.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make spawning available for every1?
